content: **mûtske** *mûtske is the frisian word for small hat the û is pronounced more or less like the oo in good this small hat is knit in the round from the brim up using either double-pointed needles or a circular needle for the magic-loop method it has a simple yet decorative stitch pattern and the decreases on the crown form fun swirling rays mûtske is a quick little knit that will make a lovely baby gift and will fit the average newborn baby head * **finished measurements** size newborn measured unstretched circumference approx 31 cm 12¼ height approx 14 cm 5½ **yarn** filcolana merci 50% merino wool 50% pima cotton 50 g/200 m/219 yds or a similar fingering weight yarn mc approx 20 g/80 m/88 yds shown in merci shade 101 natural white cc approx 2 g/8 m/9 yds shown in merci shade 611 honeydew **needles** 3 0 mm us 2½ or other size to obtain correct gauge and 2 5 mm us 1½ or 0 5 mm one size smaller than gauge needles double-pointed needles can be used or long circular needles for magic-loop method **notions** tapestry needle 1 stitch marker **gauge** approx 29 sts x 42 row in hat body stitch pattern on larger needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 blog post about this design mûtske 1 1 https //www meruladesigns com/knitting/mutske/
